params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: Required. The project whose groups are to be listed. The format is: projects/[PROJECT_ID_OR_NUMBER]

params.name: data.children_of_group
params.description: A group name. The format is: projects/[PROJECT_ID_OR_NUMBER]/groups/[GROUP_ID] Returns groups whose parent_name field contains the group name. If no groups have this parent, the results are empty.

params.name: data.ancestors_of_group
params.description: A group name. The format is: projects/[PROJECT_ID_OR_NUMBER]/groups/[GROUP_ID] Returns groups that are ancestors of the specified group. The groups are returned in order, starting with the immediate parent and ending with the most distant ancestor. If the specified group has no immediate parent, the results are empty.

params.name: data.descendants_of_group
params.description: A group name. The format is: projects/[PROJECT_ID_OR_NUMBER]/groups/[GROUP_ID] Returns the descendants of the specified group. This is a superset of the results returned by the children_of_group filter, and includes children-of-children, and so forth.

params.name: data.page_size
params.description: A positive number that is the maximum number of results to return.

params.name: data.page_token
params.description: If this field is not empty then it must contain the next_page_token value returned by a previous call to this method. Using this field causes the method to return additional results from the previous method call.
